name: Organism:Warfare
description:
You are a cancer cell, defend from imunity system cells and infect them.  Controlls: W,S,A,D - Movement Q,E - Rotation Right Click (or hold) - shooting I made this with the help of Ascensive Games(Artist) in 24H for Brackeys game jam. 

Note: This is my first game jam and i know, that my game is not finished, how it should be. :)

JPhantom - Programming Ascensive Games - Art
